    This is a CIS555 assignment to build a server that supports "GET" and "HEAD" request.

    • Method Detail

      • processRequest

        public static void processRequest(java.net.Socket request)
                           throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Takes a request and adds it to the socket pool. Synchronizes the socket pool. Lets the request wait if the pool is full.
        Parameters:
        request - a request socket.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • run

        public void run()
        Removes one socket from the pool and gets input stream. Analyzes the request and handles it based on the request category. Writes to the output stream with proper response.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • getContentType

        public static java.lang.String getContentType(java.lang.String name)
        Takes a name of a file. Guesses the content type of the file based on its name.
        Parameters:
        name - name of a file.
        Returns:
        a string representing the content type of the file.
